name: Santee
shortDescription: Family-friendly East County city known for lakeside parks, outdoor recreation, and suburban affordability.
fullDescription: Santee offers a relaxed suburban lifestyle with access to Mission Trails Regional Park, Santee Lakes Recreation Preserve, and the Westfield Santee Town Center. Its convenient location along the SR-52 corridor provides easy access to both downtown San Diego and East County amenities while maintaining a small-town community feel.
heroImageAlt: Community park and green space in Santee

neighborhoods.name: La Mesa
neighborhoods.description: Adjacent city to the south with historic downtown village and walkable neighborhoods.

neighborhoods.name: El Cajon
neighborhoods.description: Neighboring city with diverse dining options and more affordable housing options.

neighborhoods.name: San Diego
neighborhoods.description: Major metropolitan center with employment hubs, cultural attractions and beaches.
neighborhoods.imageAlt: San Diego skyline viewed from the bay

neighborhoods.name: National City
neighborhoods.description: Urban city to the southwest with bayfront access and diverse dining.

highlights.title: Lakeside Living
highlights.description: Santee Lakes Recreation Preserve offers fishing, camping and walking trails around seven beautiful lakes.

highlights.title: Outdoor Adventure
highlights.description: Gateway to Mission Trails Regional Park with 60+ miles of hiking and biking trails.

highlights.title: Family Amenities
highlights.description: Excellent schools, community parks and Westfield Santee Town Center shopping.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Community park green space and walking path

highlights.title: Convenient Location
highlights.description: Easy freeway access via SR-52 and SR-67 to downtown San Diego and East County.

faqs.question: What are the best neighborhoods in Santee?
faqs.answer: Popular areas include Fanita Ranch, Carlton Hills, and neighborhoods near Santee Lakes and Mission Trails.

faqs.question: How are the schools in Santee?
faqs.answer: Santee is served by the highly-rated Santee School District and Grossmont Union High School District.

faqs.question: What is there to do in Santee?
faqs.answer: Enjoy Santee Lakes, Mission Trails hiking, Town Center shopping, and community events like Concerts in the Park.

faqs.question: How is the commute to downtown San Diego?
faqs.answer: About 20-30 minutes via SR-52 depending on traffic, making Santee popular with downtown workers.
